lead_paragraph: Wilmington Trust and the M&T Bank Corporation said on Monday that they would merge, creating a major lender in the eastern United States and a global provider of wealth management.
snippet: Wilmington Trust and M&T Bank Corp. said Monday that they would merge to form a major lender in the eastern United States and a global provider of wealth management.

headline.main: Wilmington Trust and M&T Bank to Merge

abstract: Wilmington Trust and M&T Bank Corp. said Monday that they would merge to form a major lender in the eastern United States and a global provider of wealth management.
